sect1.para: ISO images are available for free under and other mirrors.
The following lists some of the many ways to obtain NetBSD on CD-ROM. If you offer one and would like it to be listed here, contact us.
The latest official release is NetBSD &release.latest;. One can also obtain older formal releases of NetBSD, as well as snapshots of the -current development tree.

sect3.title: 3.0.1 - OpenSource-ISO.de
sect3.para: OpenSource-ISO.de is a German vendor offering CD versions of NetBSD. They ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 3.0 - AllLinuxCD
sect3.para: AllLinuxCD carries a number of CD version of NetBSD 3.0 (2.x is also available). They ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 3.0 - BSD-Systems.co.uk
sect3.para: BSD-Systems.co.uk ships NetBSD/i386 3.0/2.1, NetBSD/amd64 3.0/2.1 and NetBSD/sparc64 3.0/2.1 worldwide. They also supply the NetBSD live CD. By purchasing a NetBSD CD from BSD-Systems.co.uk, you are indirectly donating to the NetBSD Project to further development. On each CD sold, 50 pence (0.50) is donated back to the Project.

sect3.title: 3.0 - Kordula's Web Services, CDs and DVDs
sect3.para: Kordula's Web Services offers the latest NetBSD release 3.0 on CD as well as CD-ROM sets of the NetBSD 3.0 release for i386 architecture, which includes binaries, full source code and precompiled packages for many of the ports. Alternatively, they also offer the content of these sets on a single DVD+R.
Price: Eur. 15,00 / USD 15.00 plus shipping.
Kordula's Web Services also created a new NetBSD web forum (default language English) to support the NetBSD community.

sect3.title: 3.0 - Linux System Labs
sect3.para: Linux System Labs offers the NetBSD 3.0 release on three multiarchitecture CDs. They're located in Australia, but will gladly ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 3.0 - Linux-Distro.co.uk
sect3.para: Linux Distro UK is selling NetBSD 3.0 for amd64, i386, macppc, and dreamcast platforms. Packages for amd64 and i386 are also available as separate CDs. The company is based in the UK but does offer cheap shipping to the rest of the world.

sect3.title: 3.0 - linuxcenter.ru
sect3.para: LinuxCenter is selling NetBSD 3.0. Packages are also available on separate CD included in bundle. Company located in Russia.

sect3.title: 3.0 - Linuxiso.co.uk
sect3.para: Linuxiso.co.uk offers NetBSD 3.0 for a wide range of supported platforms (including multiplatform sets). Shipping available worldwide.

sect3.title: 3.0 - Maxtux.co.uk
sect3.para: maxtux.co.uk sells a single i386 installation CD of NetBSD 3.0, 2.1, 2.0.2, 1.6.2, and the i386 binary package 6-CD set for the NetBSD 1.6.1.

sect3.title: 2.1 - Linux Central
sect3.para: Linux Central ships a NetBSD 2.1 CD, 2.0.2 CD, and 2.0.2 two multiarch CDs. NetBSD 1.6 and old 1.5.1 4 CD set (previously available on BSD Central) still in the stock.

sect3.title: 2.1 - Mensys BV
sect3.para: Mensys sells NetBSD 2.1 on CD-ROM, and offer several payment methods. The installation CD contains NetBSD for i386, amd64 and macppc machines, and two multiarch CDs. Check the site for details.

sect3.title: 2.1 - CheepLinux
sect3.para: CheepLinux offers a four CDROM set of NetBSD 2.1 - three multiarch CDs and one with source code. Orders dispatch before 3:30PM on the same day and ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 2.0.2 - BSD Mall: NetBSD 2.0.x release CD
sect3.para: BSD Mall offer multi-boot 2.0 and 2.0.2 release CD. The CD-ROM contains full binary release for i386, macppc, sparc64, sparc, and source for all architectures. CD-ROM is bootable on all four architectures.

sect3.title: 2.0.2 - Techbits
sect3.para: in Australia sells NetBSD 2.0.2 Installation CDs for the i386 platform. Available as single discs with either install+source or install+packages, or both together in a 2-CD set. techbits happily ships worldwide.

sect3.title: 2.0 - CheapISO.com
sect3.para: CheapISO.com Online Store distribute NetBSD 2.0 and 1.6.2, shipping it worldwide.

sect3.title: 2.0 - LinuxPickup
sect3.para: LinuxPickup - Your On-Line Linux & xBSD CD Distribution Source! LinuxPickup currently offers various versions of NetBSD, including 2.0/1.6.2 Installation and Packages CDs, 1.6.1 Complete (8-CD) Set, and Live! CDs for 1.6 and 2.0. LinuxPickup provides International Shipping and various Payment Options to ensure shopping is fast and simple.

sect3.title: 1.6.1 - XPLinux NetBSD CDROMS
sect3.para: XPLinux sells NetBSD Release CDROMS for i386, packages, and the NetBSD Live CDROM.

sect3.title: 1.6 - BSD Mall: NetBSD release CDs
sect3.para: Daemon News has been selling NetBSD releases on shrink-wrapped CD sets since 1999. They are currently available at bsdmall.com and for resellers through Cylogistics. They will always have the current set. These include a 3rd "Live Filesystem" CD and are available on a subscription basis.
Daemon News uses the proceeds to promote NetBSD at trade conferences and subsidize the DN Print Magazine.

sect3.title: 1.6 - MCD2 Diffusion
sect3.para: MCD2 Diffusion distributes a NetBSD 1.6 CDROM.
MCD2 Diffusion offers next working day delivery for Metropolitan France. Delivery outside of France is available for an additional carriage cost.

sect3.title: 1.6 - Wasabi Systems
sect3.para: Wasabi Systems carries two editions of the NetBSD 1.6 release on CD-ROM. The Standard Edition contains bootable CDs for i386 PC, Alpha, DECstation, SPARC, Power Macintosh, and VAX platforms. The Deluxe Edition contains 6 CD-ROMs and over 3 GB of pre-compiled third party software for x86 PCs. They are available through the Wasabi Systems web site.

sect3.title: 1.5.3 - Cylogistics
sect3.para: Cylogistics is a distributor for the Daemon News 1.5.3 and Wasabi 1.5.2 NetBSD releases on CD-ROM, as well as other BSD products to resellers only. Cylogistics also promotes NetBSD at shows and events.

sect3.title: 1.5 - NetBSD/i386 Firewall Project
sect3.para: The NetBSD/i386 firewall project now sells a CD version as well. The CD does not only contain the firewall distribution, but all the binaries and sources of the i386 port of NetBSD as well. There's also a 3-CD kit that contains the source code of almost all the packages in the package source tree.

sect3.title: Custom - Yong S. Yi: Release versions for all architectures
sect3.para: Yong S. Yi ysyi@async.org also produces custom CD's, including the release, binary packages, and documentation, for whatever architecture (or combination of architectures) is requested. Price is US $6.50, including shipping to any U.S. location.

sect3.title: Argentina - 3.0 - Silvio Riesco
sect3.para:
We sell a 2 cd set of NetBSD ($8) and send to all Argentina and Latin America. Visit
or email linux-cd@wguia.com for more information.

sect3.title: Australia - 1.6.1 - lankum.com
sect3.para: lankum.com carries the NetBSD 1.6.1 multi-cd1 CD-R (i386, macppc, sparc, sparc64 and source) and also the NetBSD/i386 1.6 release 7-CD set. They serve mainly the Australian and New Zealand markets but do also ship worldwide.

sect3.title: Australia - 1.6.1 Linux Information Technology
sect3.para:
Linux Information Technology are currently selling NetBSD 1.6.1 for macppc and i386. At the moment, shipping is limited to Australia. They would be happy to provide other ports if requested.
Email: sales@linuxit.com.au Address: 271a South street Hilton WA, Australia Phone: (08) 9331 8051 Fax: (08) 6210 1710

sect3.title: Brazil - 2.1 - Atuatech SuperStore
sect3.para: Atuatech SuperStore in Brazil sells NetBSD CD-ROMs for all ports. For details and inquiries, please contact compras-atuatech@atuatech.com.br, or visit .

sect3.title: Bulgaria - 1.6 - CDforME.net (i386)
sect3.para: CDforME.net produces a set of four NetBSD/i386 1.6 CD-ROMs which include release binaries and packages for the i386 platform, for only 18.00 EURO (one Boot CD plus six pkg CDs) Shipping not included, and a single i386 installation CD for 3 EURO.

sect3.title: Canada - 1.6.1 - CheapBytes (i386 only)
sect3.para: CheapBytes produce a set of 9 NetBSD/i386 1.6.1 CD-ROMs which include release binaries and packages for the i386 platform, for US $24.99 plus shipping, and a single i386 installation CD for US $4.99.

sect3.title: Canada - 1.6 - Edmunds Enterprises (i386 only)
sect3.para: Edmunds Enterprises of America, Inc. produces NetBSD/i386 CDs (binary sets only). Their orders almost always ship within 24 hours of payment. Payment options include credit card (Visa, MasterCard, AMEX), mail order, or PayPal.

sect3.title: China - 2.0.2 - Freewares.cn
sect3.para: Linuxstore.Freewares.cn offers CDs of NetBSD 2.0.2 for x86, PowerPC and SPARC, shipping within China mainland. See for more details.

sect3.title: China - 1.6.2 - Linuxcity.com.cn
sect3.para: Linuxcity.com.cn offers CDs of NetBSD 1.6.2 and 1.6.1 for i386, shipping within China mainland (not including Hongkong, Macao and Taiwan). See their site for more details.

sect3.title: Czech Republic - 2.0 - NetBSD.cz
sect3.para: NetBSD.cz offers NetBSD 2.0 on CD-R and DVD-R, including binary packages based upon pkgsrc-2004Q3.

sect3.title: France - 3.0 - getlinux (amd64, i386, macppc)
sect3.para: Getlinux offers NetBSD 3.0 on CD-ROM.

sect3.title: France - 3.0 - Ikarios (i386, macppc)
sect3.para: Ikarios offers NetBSD 3.0 on CD-ROM.

sect3.title: Germany - 2.0.2 Linux2go
sect3.para: German-based Linux2go offers NetBSD 2.0.2 and ships within Germany.

sect3.title: Germany/Europe - 2.0 Lehmanns Bookshop
sect3.para: German-based (and Europe-wide shipping) bookshop Lehmanns offers a NetBSD 2.0 4-CD-set.

The set contains bootable install media for NetBSD 2.0 on i386, macppc, sparc, sparc64, vax and the installation files for several other ports. A third CD contains a set of essential packages for i386. The complete source code (kernel, userland, X and pkgsrc) is available on the fourth CD.

sect3.title: Germany and EU - 1.6.2 - bsdiso - Software Service Ronald Brock
sect3.para: http://www.bsdiso.de/ offers 1.6.2 CD's for NetBSD/i386 as well as other platforms, shipping within the European Union from Germany.

sect3.title: Germany - 1.6.1 - ixsoft Softwareentwicklung
sect3.para: ixsoft Softwareentwicklung offers several 1.6.1 CD's for various platforms. See their site for more details.

sect3.title: India - 3.0 - LinuxBazar
sect3.para: offers a 2-disc set of NetBSD/i386 3.0. They also ship to Bangladesh, Bhutan, Nepal, Pakistan and Sri Lanka.

sect3.title: Netherlands - 1.6 - J. Rosink (alpha, i386, sparc, macppc)
sect3.para: offers NetBSD bootable CD-ROMs for alpha, i386, sparc and macppc, as well as the 6 CD i386 binary package set.

sect3.title: New Zealand - 1.6.1 - lankum.com
sect3.para: See lankum.com.

sect3.title: Singapore - 1.6.2 - Mynasoft (i386)
sect3.para: Mynasoft offers NetBSD 1.6.2 (binaries, source and packages) on CD-ROM.

sect3.title: Spain - 1.6.2 - Compralinux.com
sect3.para: Compralinux.com offers NetBSD 1.6.2 and older version multi-architecture and i386 specific CD-ROMs within Spain.

sect3.title: Spain - 1.6 - Linux-GPL.com
sect3.para: Linux-GPL.com offers NetBSD 1.6 on CD-ROM for the Spanish market. Linux-GPL.com ofrece la última versión de NetBSD para el mercado español.

sect3.title: USA - 1.6.2 - FreeSoftwareCDR
sect3.para: FreeSoftwareCDR offers NetBSD 1.6.2 for Intel at . You can order a full set, including the install CD and 6 package CDs, or a single install CD.

sect3.title: USA - 1.6.1 - CheapBytes (i386 only)
sect3.para: See CheapBytes.

sect3.title: USA - 1.6 - Edmunds Enterprises (i386 only)
sect3.para: See Edmunds Enterprises.

sect3.title: USA - 3.1 (Or current release) - Gearhart & Yeager Company
sect3.para: Gearhart & Yeager offer the latest versions for all architectures. Cost/CD: $2.00

sect3.title: Ukraine - 3.0 - Lafox.Net (amd64, i386)
sect3.para: Lafox.Net offers NetBSD 1.6, 2.0.x, and 3.0 for i386 and amd64 platforms. Precompiled packages for NetBSD 2.0/3.0 shipped separately on one DVD or as CDs set. Some non-official distributions are also available.

sect3.title: Official - Official NetBSD released CD images
sect3.para: This directory contains one image per port, and they are bootable on those platforms currently supporting CD-ROM booting. The macppc image is bootable on all versions of OpenFirmware.
Also included is a CD set of binary packages compiled for NetBSD/i386. See the README files in the download directory for more information.
The list of NetBSD ISO download sites provides a list of sites worldwide where these official ISO images can be downloaded.

sect3.title: 1.5.x - Multiple architecture images
sect3.para: - 1.5 and 1.5.2 multiple architecture bootable ISO images have been made available by &a.gendalia;. The README.html file explains what each ISO image contains.

sect3.title: 1.6.1 with KAME - http://openlab.plathome.co.jp/ipv6/index.html
sect3.para: - Weekly bootable CD images of NetBSD 1.6.1, 1.5.3 and 1.4.2 with KAME IPv6 implementation.
